overview: The film is about the Molokans living in the villages of Violetovo and Lermontovo, located in Armenia. Local residents here have been loyal to traditions for centuries and try to protect the purity of their world and national identity. That is why they do not marry people from other nationalities and, over the years of communication with the Armenian population of nearby villages, have not merged with local residents. The main character of the film is a blind old man who will introduce us to the Molokans.
title: Fioletovo
